Josh Owen, LLC

Working closely with Josh Owen, I designed and developed a site that matched the internationally renowned designer's sense of minimalism and approach. Visit joshowen.com

With a focus on responsive design, minimal ui, and typography, we worked to craft an experience that focused on his work, style and process while still maintaing a foothold on modern web design techniques and standards.

Visit joshowen.com
